Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    'Toast Notification'.NotificationType,
    "Success", 'Toast Notification'.Icons.Success,
    "Warning", 'Toast Notification'.Icons.Warning,
    "Error", 'Toast Notification'.Icons.Error,
    "Info", 'Toast Notification'.Icons.Info
)

ColorFade(
    ColorValue(
        Switch(
            'Toast Notification'.NotificationType,
            "Success", 'Toast Notification'.Styles.Colors.Success,
            "Warning", 'Toast Notification'.Styles.Colors.Warning,
            "Error", 'Toast Notification'.Styles.Colors.Error,
            "Info", 'Toast Notification'.Styles.Colors.Info
        )
    ), 
    50%
)

CustomProperties.Name: NotificationHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Initial height of the notification component

CustomProperties.Name: Duration
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Duration which the notification is visible on the screen (ms)

CustomProperties.Name: NotificationMessage
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Message to be shown in the notification

CustomProperties.Name: FontSize
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Text font size of the notification message

CustomProperties.Name: NotificationTypes
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Enum of notification types to be used in Notification Type property

CustomProperties.Name: OutIsShowNotification
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Property to control the visibility of the notification

CustomProperties.Name: OutNotificationHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Property to control the height of the component

CustomProperties.DisplayName: Navigate to Screen When Notification Closes
CustomProperties.Name: NavigateToScreenWhenNotificationCloses
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Defines a screen to navigate when the notification closes
